resources.string: Press the \"listen\" button to hear a word. Then click the button with the name of the word you heard. Attention: The exercise may contain words, which make no sense.

Press the \"listen\" button to listen to the word, then press \"record\" and repeat the word you heard. After you finished repeating the word, press \"recording ...\" to stop the recording. Attention: The exercise may contain words, which make no sense.
Read the word on the screen
Press the \"record\" button, then read the word shown in the middle of the screen out loud. After you finished repeating the word, press \"recording ...\" to stop the recording.
Upload your personal picture from your gallery
"To use this application, the permission to record your voice, to write to your external storage and to use your camera is needed"

This is the daily evaluation screen. Here you can see your stats after each successfully absolved training session. The scale shows how you performed in comparison to healthy test persons, where 100% means your results are in the range of a healthy person and 0% means your result is far off from the range of a healthy person. For further information like your exact value or a nice visualization, click on one of the bars to get the information for this characteristic.

When the restart session button is pressed and a training session is available, the exercises in the session will get changed.\nIf the training session has already been done, new exercises will appear and a new training session can be done!
Each day you get a new set of different exercises to do. Click here to start your daily training set now!
Click here to see the list of possible exercises you can do individually. Do them as much as you want and whenever you want!
Check out your daily results here! See how the values of your hearing, your intonation and your speech rate were today!
See how you changed over the course of time! Check out if you improved in the last months and keep your training up!
You finished your training session for today!\nNow go and take a look at your results!
Please press the \"record\" button and then start describing the picture on the screen. When you are finished press the \"recording ...\" button.
Please read the sentence on the screen. Press the \"record\" button when you are ready. When you are finished press the \"recording ...\" button.
In this exercise you have to repeat words, which you will hear from the device.\nThis exercise is used to measure the intelligebility of your speech.
In this exercise you have to choose a word, which you will hear from the device.\nThis exercise is used to measure your hearing ability.
In this exercise you have to read a list of different words.\nThis exercise is used to measure the articulation precision of your speech
In this exercise you have to describe a picture, which will be shown on the screen.\nThis exercise is used to measure the intonation of your voice during free speech.
In this exercise you have to read a sentence, which will be shown on the screen.\nThis exercise is used to measure the intonation of your voice during continuous speech.
In this exercise you have to repeat the word \"Pataka\" until a timer runs out.\nThis exercise is used to measure the rate at which you speak.

Welcome to CITA, the Cochlear-Implant-Testing-App. This Application is used to collect and evaluate data about your speaking ability as well as your hearing ability. To do so you have to complete a set of exercises every day, after which you can take a look at your results. The app will also provide you with a profile, where you can save important data about you. To do all of this CITA needs access to your microphone and your storage. To allow all of this press the start button below and then \"allow\" in the popup windows. Now press the start button below to start creating your profile for using this app.\nLetÂ´s go !
You have to press the \"listen\" button before you can repeat the word you heard!
Good Job! If you want to repeat the exercise please press \"Again\". If you want to continue the training session press \"Next\".
something went wrong please try again!
"How do you want to set your picture?"
Do your daily exercises now to keep improving!
and show me what you`ve got!
\u0020as many times as possible in five seconds. For example like that:\u0020
\u0020Press \"record\" when you are ready to start the timer. The timer automatically stops the exercise after five seconds.
Trainingset\nThis is a set of exercises you should complete every day.\nStart now!

This is the trainingset, which you should complete each day! All exercises are chosen to measure a different part of your ability to hear and speak. After you finished all the exercises go ahead and take a look at the results of the day to see your performance! If you are not happy go to exercises and choose one to improve a specific result! \n Now let`s get started!
Nothing left to do today. Good Job !
